Class Axis.AbstractAxis

java.lang.Object
  dr.app.gui.chart.Axis.AbstractAxis
All Implemented Interfaces:
Axis
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlankAxis, DiscreteAxis, LinearAxis, LogAxis
Enclosing interface:
Axis
public abstract static class Axis.AbstractAxis
extends java.lang.Object
implements Axis

class AbstractAxis This class provides a base class for all axis.

UNIT

private static final int UNIT
autoCalibrate Attempt to find the optimum axis range and ticks. This will attempt to use atleast numMajorTick ticks on the axis.

log10

public static double log10(double inValue)
A static method that uses the natural log to obtain log to base10. This is required for the linear autoCalibrate but will also be used by a derived class giving a log transformed axis.
